content:
Agent wallets + autonomous payments are exactly the layer we're building toward: **budgets as a control plane**, settlement on Bitcoin (often Lightning), and receipts so spend is auditable. We're not there yet on x402/aibtc wiring, but the primitives are in place: Neobank (treasury, budgets), Nostr for coordination, and verification so pay-after-verify is possible for objective jobs.

We wrote up why we advocate Bitcoin for settlement and how it fits with identity + coordination:

https://openagents.com/kb/bitcoin-for-agents/

And the full stack (identity, coordination, money):

https://openagents.com/kb/
